text: Hi Mark - thanks for your response! I was able to figure it out - all of the HubSpot forums made template building a lot harder than it needs to be. I was able to input my own code into modules and have it come out perfectly. In Campaign Monitor, you just simply upload your code. In HubSpot, you have to go here, there, and everywhere to add a simple custom button. Oof! Glad I figured it out though - thanks again for your response!
This client is hoping for a customized template that HubSpot did not offer in the normal Drag and Drop editor.

Hello everyone--glad to be here! I’ve been a developer for a long time, but am new to HubSpot CMS. My current employer recently became a HubSpot partner so I’m sure there’s a lot of HubSpot development in my future.

hi everyone.
Is it possible to make paganation on webpage as custom module from hubDB and redirect each page?
